DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate and compare between excision with primary closure of wound and excision with Rhomboid flap reconstruction in the treatment of pilonidal sinus as regard duration of operation, healing time, hospital stay, complications and recurrence rate.
DOC.brief_title: Rhomboid Flap Versus Primary Closure After Excision of Sacrococcygeal Pilonidal Sinus. (A Prospective Randomized Study)
